form.name: <input type="text" name="name" value="Bug" class="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border-gray-300 shadow-sm focus:border-indigo-500 focus:ring-indigo-500" placeholder="Tag name (e.g., \"Bug\", \"Feature\", \"High Priority\")" required id="id_name">
form.color: <input type="color" name="color" value="#dc2626" class="mt-1 block w-16 h-10 rounded-md border-gray-300 shadow-sm focus:border-indigo-500 focus:ring-indigo-500" id="id_color">
